Class Burger

java.lang.Object
com.example.model.MenuItem
com.example.model.Sandwich
com.example.model.Burger
public class Burger extends Sandwich
Represents a Burger MenuItem that extends Sandwich. A burger has either a single or double beef patty with add-ons. Price is calculated based on patty size and additional toppings.

  • Constructor Details

    • Burger

      public Burger(Bread bread, boolean doublePatty, ArrayList<AddOns> addOns, int quantity)
      Constructs a new Burger with specified components.
      Parameters:
      bread - the type of bread for the burger
      doublePatty - true for double patty, false for single
      addOns - list of additional toppings
      quantity - number of burgers ordered

  • Method Details

    • price

      public double price()
      Calculates the total price including quantity and add-ons.
      Overrides:
      price in class Sandwich
      Returns:
      total price for this burger order

    • basePrice

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a formatted string representation of the burger. Format: "Burger, [single|double][bread][addons][total price][quantity]"
      Overrides:
      toString in class Sandwich
      Returns:
      formatted string with ingredients, price and quantity

    • getIngredients

      public String getIngredients()
      Returns a string listing all burger ingredients. Format: "Burger, [single|double][bread][addons]"
      Overrides:
      getIngredients in class Sandwich
      Returns:
      formatted string with patty size, bread and add-ons
